news.title: Magdalena Bay to Release New Songs in Nice Day Box Set
news.summary: The collection houses the duo’s recent spate of singles, including new tracks “This Is the World (I Made It for You)” and “Nice Day”

news.title: Hercules & Love Affair Announce EP, Share New Song: Listen
news.summary: Andy Butler made the new song “Someone Else Is Calling” with Hips & Lips’ Elín Ey and Paranoid London’s Quinn Whalley

news.title: 10 New Albums You Should Listen to Now: FKA twigs, Colter Wall, and More
news.summary: Stream new releases from FKA twigs; Colter Wall; Summer Walker; Navy Blue; Austra; Sword II; Quinn & FearDorian; K-Lone; Boldy James & Nicholas Craven; and JJJJJerome Ellis

news.title: Avalon Emerson Shares Video for New & the Charm Song: Watch
news.summary: “Eden” is the DJ and producer’s first release under her Avalon Emerson & the Charm moniker since her 2023 album of the same name

news.title: Watch Karol G and Marco Antonio Solís Perform “Coleccionando Heridas” at 2025 Latin Grammys
news.summary: The artists were accompanied by a live band and broke out some salsa dancing for their Tropicoqueta duet

news.title: Watch Bad Bunny Perform “Weltita” at 2025 Latin Grammys
news.summary: The evening’s most-nominated artist was joined by members of the Puerto Rican band Chuwi, who also feature on the Debí Tirar Más Fotos track

news.title: Miley Cyrus Shares New Song “Dream as One” for New Movie Avatar: Fire and Ash: Listen
news.summary: Cyrus worked on the single with Andrew Wyatt, Mark Ronson, Simon Franglen, and others
